resources.string: No special changes are made to die rolls\n

If the first roll fails, you have a second chance to roll again.

Weapons: Glaive, Icy Longspear

If the first roll succeeds, you must roll another successful check or be defeated.

Monster: Giant Hermit Crab

All maximum rolls on this die count as one higher.

Weapons: Heavy Pick, Scythe
For six sided dice, ones count as threes\n
When you attempt to defeat Caizarlu Zerren, after you make the roll, roll 1d6. On a 1 or 2, start the check over. Cards Played on the previous check do not affect the new check.\n
